U

u_B - Static variable in class simulation.montecarlo.CrystalField

update(double[], double[]) - Method in class simulation.mmsolve.QRdcmp
Starting from the stored QR decomposition A=Q*R, update it to be the QR decomposition of the matrix Q*(R + u \otimes v).
